text:
Thymoquinone an ingredient found in the Nigella sativa (a.k.a Black Seed) used for #chloroquine

I’ve grown up with it (thx to my dad)

Take alongside Vit C, Zinc + (Turmeric, Ginger & Garlic Infused drink) 

Sliced lemon in hot water

Be healthy 

The fight against #coronavirus https://t.co/6jqZqsZ0Dx
